data.name: HEX: Dead of Winter Bundle
data.detailed_description:
HEX: Dead of Winter Bundle

As the battle for the Frost Ring Arena wages on, Lixil and Hogarth retreat to rally their forces. Discover the all new Heartsworn, and use your charges to further their ends. Explore the Twilight Host, judge your opponents, and find them wanting. New Keywords will power your strategies like Momentum (which harnesses playing resources), Verdict (which makes your opponent choose damaging effects for themselves), and Portal (which creates card advantage, but may just bring about horrors from beyond). Will you survive the winter? Find out today!

This bundle comes with a total of 6 boosters from the eighth card set in HEX, “Dead of Winter”. Paired with 10 pieces of shiny equipment to enhance your cards on the battlefield, this collection gives you the tools to avoid the dangerous new portals that are appearing in the Frost Ring Arena. Additionally, there are a few consumables and one of our rare cosmetics in this pack – as well as some in-game currency to give you a little boost.

Install HEX: Shards of Fate on Steam to be able to use the contents within this bundle.

BUNDLE CONTENTS

BOOSTER PACKS

  • 6x “Dead of Winter” Booster Packs
    This card set comes with new keywords: “Momentum”, “Verdict”, and “Portal”. A focus on Constants and Deathcry cards round out this booster pack.

    EQUIPMENT (PvE Only)

    Equipment is one of the great innovations HEX brought about in the Trading Card Game genre, made possible by the digital nature of the game. Items modify your cards by altering their attributes or effects, and giving you another option to customize your deck. Equipment can be acquired on your many adventures, through victory in battle, opening treasure chests, and completing quests in the campaign. Items come in varying rarities, similar to cards and improve or enhance your already powerful cards.

    • 1x Shield of Illumination
    • 1x Decayed Robes
    • 1x Eventide Boots
    • 1x Twilight Scout Gloves
    • 1x Grimplekin Goggles
    • 1x Bear Gloves
    • 1x Brutal Boots
    • 1x Luminous Raiment
    • 1x Metal, Mind Case
    • 1x Greatblade of Judgment

    CONSUMABLES

    • 4x Common Stardust

    Unlock extended card artwork with this magical material. Each card needs a single Stardust of matching rarity to reveal its complete artwork to you. Which cards will you choose?

    SLEEVE

  • 1x “Dead of Winter” Deck Sleeve

    Sleeves are not quite the same in a digital Trading Card Game. You can still customize your deck with a cool card back, but you don’t have to apply the sleeve to every individual card: just select the one you like and you’re all set!

    CURRENCY

  • 2,500 Gold

    Gold is the in-game currency for HEX and can be earned in much the same way as equipment, through victories in battle, completed quests and challenges. Gold can be used much like the premium currency Platinum: you can spend it in the auction house, on individual cards, entire booster packs and almost everything else that’s put up for sale by other players. Gold is also used to upgrade loot chests through Kismet’s Well that rewards the fortunate with rare rewards.

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2120 CPU 3.30 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB DirectX 9.0c compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Mavericks 10.9
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 320M, Radeon HD 2400 or Intel HD 3000
